content.question: Which of the following code segments, appearing in a class other than Painting, will correctly create an instance of a Painting object?

choices.label: Painting p = new Painting("Frida Kahlo", "Self Portrait", 1939);
Painting p = new Painting(1939, "Frida Kahlo", "Self Portrait");

skill.text: 2.B: Write program code involving data abstractions.
